summary: Community Board will include an AI-assisted moderation system to block/route illegal content during uploads, with specific enforcement rules and user messaging.
architectural_notes: Moderation scope limited to Community Board uploads (not app-wide).
Enforcement rules: underage content = block upload; copyright violations = block upload; borderline hate speech = manual review (threats also to be detected; disposition not further specified).
User-facing messaging: display a notice that the upload was blocked for violating guidelines when blocked.
known_issues: Build attempt for the moderation system failed with error: 'AI was unable to complete your request. Try rephrasing it more clearly.'

existing_features.title: Add a moderation review queue for Community Board content that is routed to manual review, including backend methods for admins to list pending items and to approve or reject them.
When an upload is blocked by moderation, show the user a clear error message stating that the upload was blocked for violating guidelines.
Update frontend actor error normalization to recognize moderation-related backend errors (blocked vs. manual review) and present user-friendly English messaging without exposing internal details.

new_feature_requests.summary: AI-assisted moderation for Community Board uploads: detect hate speech, underage content, threats, and copyright; block underage/copyright; send borderline hate speech to manual review; show 'blocked for violating guidelines' message

Implement an on-canister (no external API) AI-assisted moderation check for Community Board post creation that analyzes the post title/body and any attached video metadata and returns one of: allow, block, or manual-review.

Enforce moderation outcomes on Community Board uploads with the specified policy: underage content must be blocked entirely; copyright violations must be blocked entirely; borderline hate speech cases must be routed to manual review (not published in the public feed).

projectName: Add AI-assisted moderation to Community Board uploads (block illegal content + manual review queue)
